description.compact:
Payment
Export the documents mentioned on field 4.4.4.6. - PaymentType.

<xs:element name="PaymentMethod" type="PaymentMethod" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
Node name
The calulated values made by the validation classes

PaymentRefNo
  <xs:element name="PaymentRefNo">  <xs:simpleType>      <xs:restriction base="xs:string">          <xs:pattern value="[^ ]+ [^/^ ]+/[0-9]+"/>          <xs:minLength value="1"/>          <xs:maxLength value="60"/>      </xs:restriction>  </xs:simpleType> </xs:element>

Period 
 <xs:element name="Period">    <xs:simpleType>        <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">            <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>            <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>        </xs:restriction>    </xs:simpleType> </xs:element>

TransactionID 
 <xs:element name="TransactionID" type="SAFPTTransactionID"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTTransactionID">   <xs:restriction base="xs:string">       <xs:pattern value="[1-9][0-9]{3}-[01][0-9]-[0-3][0-9] [^ ]{1,30} [^ ]{1,20}"/>       <xs:minLength value="1"/>       <xs:maxLength value="70"/>   </xs:restriction>  </xs:simpleType>

PaymentType
 <xs:element name="PaymentType" type="SAFTPTPaymentType"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFTPTPaymentType">   <xs:annotation>       <xs:documentation> Restricao: RC para Recibo emitido no ambito do regime de IVA de Caixa           (incluindo os relativos a adiantamentos desse regime), RG para Outros recibos           emitidos </xs:documentation>   </xs:annotation>   <xs:restriction base="xs:string">       <xs:enumeration value="RC"/>       <xs:enumeration value="RG"/>   </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

Payment
Export the documents mentioned on field 4.4.4.6. - PaymentType.

docblock.description:
<xs:element name="Payment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
<xs:complexType>
   <xs:sequence>
       <xs:element ref="PaymentRefNo"/>
       <xs:element ref="ATCUD"/>
       <xs:element ref="Period" minOccurs="0"/>
       <xs:element ref="TransactionID" minOccurs="0"/>
       <xs:element ref="TransactionDate"/>
       <xs:element name="PaymentType" type="SAFTPTPaymentType"/>
       <xs:element ref="Description" minOccurs="0"/>
       <xs:element ref="SystemID" minOccurs="0"/>
       <xs:element name="DocumentStatus">
           <xs:complexType>
               <xs:sequence>
                   <xs:element ref="PaymentStatus"/>
                   <xs:element ref="PaymentStatusDate"/>
                   <xs:element ref="Reason" minOccurs="0"/>
                   <xs:element ref="SourceID"/>
                   <xs:element name="SourcePayment"
                               type="SAFTPTSourcePayment"/>
               </xs:sequence>
           </xs:complexType>
       </xs:element>
       <xs:element name="PaymentMethod" type="PaymentMethod" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
       <xs:element ref="SourceID"/>
       <xs:element ref="SystemEntryDate"/>
       <xs:element ref="CustomerID"/>
       <xs:element name="Line" maxOccurs="unbounded">
           <xs:complexType>
               <xs:sequence>
                   <xs:element ref="LineNumber"/>
                   <xs:element name="SourceDocumentID" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                       <xs:complexType>
                           <xs:sequence>
                               <xs:element ref="OriginatingON"/>
                               <xs:element ref="InvoiceDate"/>
                               <xs:element ref="Description" minOccurs="0"/>
                           </xs:sequence>
                       </xs:complexType>
                   </xs:element>
                   <xs:element ref="SettlementAmount" minOccurs="0"/>
                   <xs:choice>
                       <xs:element ref="DebitAmount"/>
                       <xs:element ref="CreditAmount"/>
                   </xs:choice>
                   <xs:element name="Tax" type="PaymentTax" minOccurs="0"/>
                   <xs:element ref="TaxExemptionReason" minOccurs="0"/>
                   <xs:element ref="TaxExemptionCode" minOccurs="0"/>
               </xs:sequence>
           </xs:complexType>
       </xs:element>
       <xs:element name="DocumentTotals">
           <xs:complexType>
               <xs:sequence>
                   <xs:element ref="TaxPayable"/>
                   <xs:element ref="NetTotal"/>
                   <xs:element ref="GrossTotal"/>
                   <!-- O conteudo desta estrutura Settlement representa o somatorio dos descontos reflectidos no elemento SettlementAmount das linhas do recibo. Trata-se de um raciocinio diverso da tabela 4.1 SalesInvoices -->
                   <xs:element name="Settlement" minOccurs="0">
                       <xs:complexType>
                           <xs:sequence>
                               <xs:element ref="SettlementAmount"/>
                           </xs:sequence>
                       </xs:complexType>
                   </xs:element>
                   <xs:element name="Currency" type="Currency"
                               minOccurs="0"/>
               </xs:sequence>
           </xs:complexType>
       </xs:element>
       <xs:element name="WithholdingTax" type="WithholdingTax"
                   minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
   </xs:sequence>
</xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

description.compact:
Gets as paymentRefNo
This identification is a sequential composition of following elements: the receipt type internal code created by the application, space, receipt series identifier, slash (/) and sequential number of the receipt within the series.

Sets a new paymentRefNo
This identification is a sequential composition of following elements: the receipt type internal code created by the application, space, receipt series identifier, slash (/) and sequential number of the receipt within the series.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as ATCUD
This field shall contain the Document Unique Code.

Sets a new ATCUD
This field shall contain the Document Unique Code.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as period
The month of the taxation period shall be indicated from “1” to “12”, counting from the start.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref="Period" minOccurs="0"/>
<!-- Periodo contabilistico do documento -->
  <xs:element name="Period">
      <xs:simpleType>
          <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
              <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>
              <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>
          </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
  </xs:element>

description.compact:
Sets a new period
The month of the taxation period shall be indicated from “1” to “12”, counting from the start.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref="Period" minOccurs="0"/>
<!-- Periodo contabilistico do documento -->
  <xs:element name="Period">
      <xs:simpleType>
          <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
              <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>
              <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>
          </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
  </xs:element>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as transactionID
The filling is required, if it is an integrated accounting and invoicing system, even if the file type (TaxAccountingBasis) shall not contain tables relating to accounting.

param.description: If true a new instance will be created if wasn't previous

description.compact:
Gets as transactionDate
Receipt’s issuing date.

Sets a new transactionDate
Receipt’s issuing date.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as systemID
Unique receipt number generated internally by the application.
<xs:element ref="SystemID" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="SystemID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

Sets a new systemID
Unique receipt number generated internally by the application.
<xs:element ref="SystemID" minOccurs="0"/>
<xs:element name="SystemID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

param.description: If true a new instance will be create if wasn't previous

description.compact:
Adds to paymentMethod stack
Indicate the payment method. In case of mixed payments, the amounts should be mentioned by payment type and date.

docblock.description:
If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can be generated as many times as necessary.
When this method is invoked a new instance of PaymentMethod is created, add to the stack then returned to be populated <xs:element name="PaymentMethod" type="PaymentMethod" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>

description.compact:
Gets paymentMethod stack
<xs:element name="PaymentMethod" type="PaymentMethod" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>

Sets a new sourceID
<xs:element ref="SourceID"/>
<xs:element name="SourceID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as systemEntryDate
<xs:element ref="SystemEntryDate"/>
<xs:element name="SystemEntryDate" type="SAFdateTimeType"/>

Sets a new systemEntryDate
<xs:element ref="SystemEntryDate"/>
<xs:element name="SystemEntryDate" type="SAFdateTimeType"/>

Sets a new customerID
<xs:element ref="CustomerID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Adds as line
When this method is invoked a new instance is created, add to the stack and returned to be populated

description.compact: Validate documents number <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[^ ]+ [^/^ ]+/[0-9]+"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
